name: Bladebreaker
description:
THE B.L.A.D.E. EMPIRE HAS INVADED PEACE VILLAGE! 

The evil B.L.A.D.E. empire's airship has arrived on the cliffs of Peace Village. Lead by Commander Zero Violence, the assault on the helpless village citizens is all but certain to end the tranquil lives of everyone present. Only one has the power to defeat Zero's onslaught: a warrior named Stardust Overdrive, the Bladebreaker. 

INTENSE CHARACTER ACTION 

Meet your enemies with intense fury! Every successive attack builds your combo further as you blast your way through Zero's airship. Rack up combos to earn tons of extra points and a high ranking! 

STEAL THEIR STRENGTH 

Recover the weapons of your defeated opponents and direct their power right back at 'em! Every weapon has different attack styles and moves for different situations. Can't decide? Pick up a dropped weapon anytime to mix and match your combat and send Zero's minions flying! But be careful, weapons can only be used for so long...

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to DPAD. Move around. Try attacking while holding different directions in the air or on the ground!

Space to SEL. Pick up weapons, drop them. Try holding forward or back to throw your weapon to deal damage!

Z to A. Jump and confirm menus.

X to B. Attack.

Enter to START.

Hold ESC to turn your Game Boy off.
